name: Mocca Gear
description:
Mocca gear is a stealth action adventure game featuring hit indie vtuber Mocca Liebeskind!

- Collect Mocca Cola!
- Collect weapons!
- Use stealth to avoid enemies!
- Fight bosses!

Controls 
Keyboard

Z - Confirm menu selection

X - Use weapon

A/S - Switch weapons

Enter - Pause

Xinput Gamepad

A - Confirm menu selection

X - Use Weapon

LB/RB - Switch weapon

Start - Pause

Music by @GameDevYal
https://twitter.com/gamedevyal?lang=en
